## SchemaParams interface

A parameter builder interface containing the `schema` property.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SchemaParams<GNodes extends string = string, GMarks extends string = string> 
```

## Properties

|  [schema](./core-types.schemaparams.schema.md) | <code>EditorSchema&lt;GNodes, GMarks&gt;</code> | The Prosemirror schema being used for the current interface |
